definition: New Rural Cooperative Medical Scheme/abbr. to 新農合|新农合
pinyin: Xin1 xing2 Nong2 cun1 He2 zuo4 Yi1 liao2

definition: rural household contract responsibility system, PRC government policy linking rural income to productivity
pinyin: nong2 cun1 jia1 ting2 lian2 chan3 cheng2 bao1 ze2 ren4 zhi4
containing_words.word: 农村家庭联产承包责任制

sentences.english: The idea of bringing revolution to the countryside had turned out to be a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 改造农村的革命理想成了虚妄的幻想。

sentences.english: The people's war has helped crush the feudal structure in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 人民战争摧毁了农村地区的封建制度。

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 农村金融抑制是当前新农村建设问题的瓶颈因素之一。

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 农村金融抑制是当前新农村建设问题的瓶颈因素之一。

sentences.english: Fourth, solving the energy supply problem in rural areas through the establishment of fuel woods.
sentences.chinese: 四是通过营造薪炭林，解决农村能源问题。

sentences.english: In addition, peasants are the leading part in building up the new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 农民大学生更是新农村建设的领头雁。

sentences.english: Contract after rent in the countryside la nd circulation practice blooming.
sentences.chinese: 反租倒包在农村土地流转的实践中脱颖而出。

sentences.english: Cigarettes,camp-fires and barbecues can all start a fire in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 香烟，营火和烧烤全部能开始一燃烧在那些农村内。

sentences.english: During the construction of socialistic new villages, people always confuse religion with feudal superstition.
sentences.chinese: 在农村中，人们往往把宗教与封建迷信联系在一起。

sentences.english: These cooperative enterprises will eventually be turned into joint stock companies.
sentences.chinese: 农村股份合作企业发展的方向是股份制。

sentences.english: We will move forward with reform of the rural land management system in an orderly manner.
sentences.chinese: 有序推进农村土地管理制度改革。

sentences.english: Whould you rather live i a town or i the country?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢住在城市怎么才能玩转魔方还是农村？

sentences.english: He told a heart-wrenching story of his childhood in the impoverished countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他讲述了在贫困农村度过的悲惨童年的经历。

sentences.english: Therefore it is feasible to obtain the electronic administrative affairs of village in our country's new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出电子村务在我国新农村建设中的可行性。

sentences.english: Those who have gone back to non-industrialized sections of the country will not be net consumers at all.
sentences.chinese: 那些回到农村的人将不再是净消费者。

sentences.english: The countryside is home to plenty of flora and fauna.
sentences.chinese: 农村拥有丰富的植物群和动物群。

definition: native place/place of origin/home state or region
School of Agriculture, school of thought of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
